name: Killer Gorilla
overview: Killer Gorilla is a 1 - 2 player Donkey Kong clone for the TRS-80. The killer gorilla has captured the player's girlfriend, and is holding her hostage atop a structure consisting of platforms, conveyor belts, and ladders. The player must move through 4 separate stages, trying to reach the top of each. On the first stage, the player must avoid thrown barrels, while on the second the player must avoid moving flames and conveyor belts. Stage 3 adds moving platforms and springs, while on stage 4 the player must walk over all switches to drop the gorilla to its doom. The player has 5 lives, and when all are lost, it's game over.
